title: decodeURIComponent
markdown:
# decodeURIComponent()

The **`decodeURIComponent()`** function decodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) component previously created by [encodeURIComponent()](/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global%5FObjects/encodeURIComponent) or by a similar routine.

## [Try it](#try%5Fit)

## [Syntax](#syntax)

```
decodeURIComponent(encodedURI)

```

### [Parameters](#parameters)

`encodedURI`

An encoded component of a Uniform Resource Identifier.

### [Return value](#return%5Fvalue)

A new string representing the decoded version of the given encoded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) component.

### [Exceptions](#exceptions)

[URIError](/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global%5FObjects/URIError)

Thrown if `encodedURI` contains a `%` not followed by two hexadecimal digits, or if the escape sequence does not encode a valid UTF-8 character.

## [Description](#description)

`decodeURIComponent()` is a function property of the global object.

`decodeURIComponent()` uses the same decoding algorithm as described in [decodeURI()](/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global%5FObjects/decodeURI). It decodes _all_ escape sequences, including those that are not created by [encodeURIComponent](/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global%5FObjects/encodeURIComponent), like `-.!~*'()`.

## [Examples](#examples)

### [Decoding a Cyrillic URL component](#decoding%5Fa%5Fcyrillic%5Furl%5Fcomponent)

```
decodeURIComponent("JavaScript_%D1%88%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BB%D1%8B");
// "JavaScript_шеллы"

```

### [Catching errors](#catching%5Ferrors)

```
try {
  const a = decodeURIComponent("%E0%A4%A");
} catch (e) {
  console.error(e);
}

// URIError: malformed URI sequence

```

### [Decoding query parameters from a URL](#decoding%5Fquery%5Fparameters%5Ffrom%5Fa%5Furl)

`decodeURIComponent()` cannot be used directly to parse query parameters from a URL. It needs a bit of preparation.

```
function decodeQueryParam(p) {
  return decodeURIComponent(p.replace(/\+/g, " "));
}

decodeQueryParam("search+query%20%28correct%29");
// 'search query (correct)'

```

## [Specifications](#specifications)

| Specification                                                                                                                                                                       |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [ECMAScript Language Specification  \# sec-decodeuricomponent-encodeduricomponent](https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/global-object.html#sec-decodeuricomponent-encodeduricomponent) |

## [Browser compatibility](#browser%5Fcompatibility)

BCD tables only load in the browser
